original_title: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics: Here's Goofy
overview: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics.  A wondrous collection of cartoon masterpieces from the great Disney legacy. Each volume in this fabulous series is filled with the kind of joy and laughter that have made these cartoons timeless. Yours to enjoy now...and forever!  HERE'S GOOFY!  Goofy's wacky escapades are a treasure chest of non-stop fun! Enjoy zillions of laughs in these three goofy gems:  ▴  For Whom The Bulls Toil (1953): While visiting Mexico, El Goofy is swept into the bullring by an adoring mob and comes face-to-face with a less-than-adoring opponent!  ▴  Lion Down (1950): Goofy needs a second tree to support his penthouse hammock. The problem? The tree he picks is home to a full-grown mountain lion!  ▴  A Knight for a Day (1945): When Squire Cedric, a budding knight in armor, wants to become "Sir" Cedric, our favorite jester turns into a jouster — with questionable results!
title: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics: Here's Goofy
